thread.title: Size 22 mum loses 40 kilos after having lap band REMOVED | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Size 22 mum loses 40 kilos after having lap band REMOVED | Daily Mail Online

author: Hannah Moore For Daily Mail Australia
title: Size 22 mum loses 40 kilos after having lap band REMOVED | Daily Mail Online
text: From obese schoolgirl to svelte mum of one: Size 22 woman drops 40 kilos in ten months after having her lap band REMOVED... and admits 'my mind is still trying to catch up to my body' Mother-of-one Kira Morrison had a lap band for 6 years but didn't lose weight She had it removed in mid 2016 and had a gastric bypass instead Within 10 months she dropped more than 40 kilos and six dress sizes Now works out at gym and sticks to diet high in fats and protein 'I will never not feel like the fat girl walking into the room,' she said Published: 07:35 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 08:03 GMT, 22 February 2017 42 shares
